author: joey.chessher
title: Technical Resource Pool
description: There is no Technical Resource Pool where Non-Programmers can access the Programming Talent needed for their proposals to be successful.
solution: Collect and make available Technical Resources that have hours available so that Non-Programmers & Programmers can staff projects as needed.
experience:
Team has 20yrs + Project Mgmt / Staffing Experience.
PMP (Project Management Professional)
PMP Number 1413330 – May 28,2011 – May 27, 2023
